title: Creativity Development Microlearning Course Based on Traditional Music

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Modular 15-minute mobile learning in BYOD environments. Focuses on science educators acquiring creative pedagogical methods integrating traditional music elements.

learning_goals: Learners analyze traditional music expression techniques to design two or more creative approaches for science classes
Learners identify three or more improvisational expression techniques in guqin (ancient zither) performance through mobile microlearning content
Participants create and improve science activity plans incorporating traditional music elements using a peer feedback system
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
